game.name: Me Alone Reissue
game.shortDescription: Apocalypse on earth! Many people have turned into monsters that eat the survivors. Stay alive as long as possible! God bless you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Apocalypse on earth! Many people have turned into monsters that eat the survivors. Stay alive as long as possible! God bless you.

reviewHighlights.text: Horror shooter. Where you will need to protect your home from zombies. + 6 types of weapons. + Good atmosphere. + Interesting animation. + Great idea....
Me Alone Reissue is a simple, unpretentious zombie shooter.
